===JQuery UI DatePicker as Wicket behavior example===

*[http://jqueryui.com/demos/datepicker/ Original javascript version can be found here]*

*Prerequisites:* Your wicket application is configured to use JQWicket as described in the [http://code.google.com/p/jqwicket "Quick Start"] guide. Additionaly to the jquery core library you have to add "jquery ui" to the JQWicket's config.

*Description:* This example demonstrates how to integrate JQuery UI DatePicker with the wicket components using JQWicket.

*Java-Code:*
{{{
public class DatePickerPage extends WebPage {

	public DatePickerPage() {
                // add text field with the datepicker popup
		add(new DatePickerTextField<String>("datepicker"));
                
                // add "inline" datepicker  
		add(new WebMarkupContainer("datepicker.inline")
                          .add(new DatePickerBehavior()));

	}
}
}}}

*Html-Template:*
{{{
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN"
	"http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"
	xmlns:wicket="http://wicket.apache.org/" xml:lang="en" lang="en">
<head>
<title>Date Picker example</title>
</head>
<body>
<p>Date: <input type="text" wicket:id="datepicker"/></p>
<br/><br/>
<p>Date: <div wicket:id="datepicker.inline"/></p>
</body>
</html>
}}}
